title: Variables & Data Types
description: Learn how to store values with variables and use different data types.

title: Control Structures
description: Control program flow using if-else, loops, and switch statements.

title: Functions
description: Write reusable code blocks with parameters and return values.

title: Objects & Classes
description: Learn object-oriented concepts like classes, objects, and methods.

title: Recursion
description: Understand functions calling themselves to solve problems elegantly.

title: Algorithms
description: Study step-by-step methods for solving problems and common algorithms.

title: Data Structures
description: Organize data efficiently using arrays, lists, stacks, and queues.

title: Sorting & Searching
description: Sort and search data efficiently using linear, binary, and other methods.

title: Error Handling & Exceptions
description: Handle errors gracefully to keep your program running smoothly.

title: File I/O
description: Read and write files, handling text and binary formats effectively.

title: Recursion vs Iteration
description: Compare recursive and iterative solutions and their pros and cons.

title: Memory Management
description: Learn how programs manage memory and optimize resource usage.
